animal.question: I say 'Moo!' and give you milk. Who am I?

hints.text: I have black and white spots.

animal.question: I say 'Meow!' and like to play with yarn. Who am I?

hints.text: I purr when you pet me.

animal.question: I say 'Woof!' and wag my tail. Who am I?
I say 'Quack!' and swim in the pond. Who am I?

hints.text: I like to swim in the water.

animal.question: I hop around and love to eat carrots. Who am I?

hints.text: I like to eat leafy greens.

animal.question: I carry my house on my back. Who am I?

hints.text: I like to eat leaves in the garden.
I come out after it rains.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. Who am I?

hints.text: I live in Africa and Asia.

animal.question: I roar very loudly and I am the king of the jungle. Who am I?
I swing from trees and love to eat bananas. Who am I?

hints.text: I love to eat yellow fruit.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and run very fast. Who am I?

plant.question: I am green and grow tall. Monkeys like to eat my yellow fruit. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am the favorite snack of a monkey
🌳 I am a very tall plant
🍌 My fruit is long and curved

plant.question: I am red and round and grow on a plant. You can eat me in a salad! What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am usually red in color
🥗 I can be used in a salad

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves and pretty colors. You put me in a vase. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 People give me as a gift
💧 I need water to stay pretty

plant.question: I am long and orange and bunnies like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 👁️ I am good for your eyes

plant.question: I am big and green and have a strong trunk. Birds like to live in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 Birds build their houses in me
🍁 My leaves change color in the fall

plant.question: I am green and leafy. You can wrap yummy things inside of me and eat me. What kind of plant am I?

hints.text: 🌯 I can be used to make wraps
🥬 I am a type of salad

plant.question: I am small and round and juicy. I grow in bunches on a vine. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I come in green, red, and purple
🍷 Juice is sometimes made from me

plant.question: I am yellow and have kernels. You can pop me and eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 I am yummy at the cinema
🟡 I am a vibrant yellow color

plant.question: I am a seed that grows into something big, but I am also in the middle of an apple. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 You can find me inside an apple
🪴 Farmers plant me in the soil

plant.question: I am a plant that has sharp needles instead of leaves, and people decorate me for Christmas. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I am green all year round
